exercise-tasks.description: List all cities with their corresponding country names
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Cities.Name AS CityName,
  Countries.Name AS CountryName
FROM Cities
INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Cities.Name AS CityName, Countries.Name AS CountryName FROM Cities INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID

exercise-tasks.description: Show the city name and population along with the country name
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Cities.Name AS CityName,
  Cities.Population,
  Countries.Name AS CountryName
FROM Cities
INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Cities.Name AS CityName, Cities.Population, Countries.Name AS CountryName FROM Cities INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID

exercise-tasks.description: List cities with their countries where the city population is greater than 5 million
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Cities.Name AS CityName,
  Countries.Name AS CountryName,
  Cities.Population
FROM Cities
INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID
WHERE Cities.Population > 5000000
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Cities.Name AS CityName, Countries.Name AS CountryName, Cities.Population FROM Cities INNER JOIN Countries ON Cities.CountryID = Countries.CountryID WHERE Cities.Population > 5000000

exercise-tasks.description: Count the number of cities in each country
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Countries.Name AS CountryName,
  COUNT(Cities.CityID) AS NumCities
FROM Countries
INNER JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID
GROUP BY Countries.Name
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName, COUNT(Cities.CityID) AS NumCities FROM Countries INNER JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID GROUP BY Countries.Name

exercise-tasks.description: List cities with country names using table aliases for both tables
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  c.Name AS CityName,
  co.Name AS CountryName
FROM Cities c
INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT c.Name AS CityName, co.Name AS CountryName FROM Cities c INNER JOIN Countries co ON c.CountryID = co.CountryID
